descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia]
[/font][center][b][font=Georgia][size=5]Required Mods[/size][size=5]
[/size]
Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB
Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE) - LITE
Enhanced Lights and FX 


[size=5]Recommended Mods
[/size]
Skyrim High Definition LODs - Dark LOD Textures
Realistic Water Two
High Quality LODs
Sun and clouds textures
Grimm's mountain retexture
Logical Grass and lush grass two
Logical Grass Saturation n Model Swap

[size=5]My INI Settings
[/size]
iMinGrassSize=80 (with Logical Grass) I used 20 in screenshots.
uGridsToLoad=7
fLightLODMaxStartFade=15000.0
fShadowLODMaxStartFade=1000.0
iShadowMapResolution=1024
bFXAAEnabled=1
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=4
fInteriorShadowDistance=4000.0000
fShadowDistance=15000.0000
fShadowBiasScale=1.0000
b30GrassVS=1
fGrassStartFadeDistance=25000.0000
fGrassMaxStartFadeDistance=25000.0000
fGrassMinStartFadeDistance=10000.0000

[size=5]Installation
[/size]
Download [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0308.htm]ENB[/url] and drop d3d9 and enbhost to skyrim directory.
Download Real Light ENB and drop all files to skyrim directory
[/font][/b][list]
[/list][b][font=Georgia]Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?]NLA 2.0[/url]
[/font][/b][list]
[/list][b][font=Georgia]Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]ELFX[/url]
[/font][/b][list]
[/list][b][font=Georgia]Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]ELE[/url][/font][/b][list]
[/list][/center]
[font=Georgia][center][b][size=5]My Pc Specs[/size]

[/b][b][size=2]GTX 1050 TI
I5-2310 
8 GB RAM
[/size]
With iMinGrassSize=80 and fov 75 getting 30 fps.[/b][/center][b][center][size=5]
Some screens by auba101

[img]https://i.hizliresim.com/LymWAj.png[/img][img]https://i.hizliresim.com/7q5rAY.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.hizliresim.com/Jamy3Q.jpg[/img]

Watch This !!!! very nice video
[youtube]JVKphkrdMKs[/youtube][youtube]m43Z5SfjsaI[/youtube]

Another great vid thanks.

NOTE
[/size]If you have fps issues try to disable Depth Of Field effect in menu (Press shift + enter)



[/center][color=#f1c232]
[/color][/b][/font][color=#f1c232]
[/color]
